languages.text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается, когда у персонажа остается 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} или меньше.

traits.locale_text: The character gains +5 to all characteristics. This bonus is doubled when they have 50% or less wounds left.
The character gains +5 to all characteristics. This bonus is doubled when they have 50% wounds or less.
The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.
The character gains +5 to all characteristics. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.
The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

languages.text: El personaje gana +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica cuando tiene un 25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} o menos.
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: El personaje gana +5 a todas las características. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica cuando tiene un 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} o menos.

languages.text: このキャラクターは全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5される。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が25%以下のときは倍になる。
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは全ての能力が+5される。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が50%以下のときは倍になる。

languages.text: 该角色所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高5点。当该角色{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不高于25%时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果翻倍。
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: 该角色所有属性提高5点。当该角色{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不高于50%时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果翻倍。

languages.text: Der Charakter erhält +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird verdoppelt, wenn er 25 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} oder weniger hat.
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter erhält +5 auf alle Eigenschaften. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird verdoppelt, wenn er 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} oder weniger hat.

languages.text: Un bonus de +5 est appliqué à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} du personnage. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé lorsque sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 25 %.
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: Un bonus de +5 est appliqué à toutes les caractéristiques du personnage. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé lorsque sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %.

languages.text: Персонаж получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается, когда у персонажа остается 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} или меньше.
languages.original_text: The character gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled when they have 25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or less.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает +5 ко всем характеристикам. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается, когда у персонажа остается 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} или меньше.
Персонаж получает +5 ко всем характеристикам. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается, когда у персонажа остается 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} или меньше.
